description: Designed for comfort, these lightweight and packable full-stretch shorts are ideal for trekking in warm conditions where freedom of movement is paramount. They are made of a double-woven stretch fabric that is durable and dries quickly. They have a comfortable and elasticated waistband with button closure, zippered mesh hand pockets and a zippered mesh security pocket on the leg that is large enough to fit a phone.
name: Fjallraven Abisko Trail Stretch Shorts - Mens
